verses.verse: וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> when יָשַׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> sat הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And it came to pass when the king בְּבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> in his house וַיהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD הֵנִֽיחַ־ <S%H5117><s%> had given him rest ל֥וֹ מִסָּבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> round about מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <S%H341><s%> from all his enemies

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> That the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נָתָ֣ן <S%H5416><s%> unto Nathan הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet רְאֵ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> See נָ֔א <S%H4994><s%> now אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> now I dwell בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in an house אֲרָזִ֑ים <S%H730><s%> of cedar וַֽאֲרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> but the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God יֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> dwelleth בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> within הַיְרִיעָֽה׃ <S%H3407><s%> curtains

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said נָתָן֙ <S%H5416><s%> And Nathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> is in בִּֽלְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> all that [is] in thine heart לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go עֲשֵׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> do כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with ס

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> came בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> And it came to pass that night הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> the same וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> that the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> came unto Nathan לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

לֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and tell אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> my servant אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַאַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you תִּבְנֶה־ <S%H1129><s%> Shalt thou build לִּ֥י בַ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> me an house לְשִׁבְתִּֽי׃ <S%H3427><s%> for me to dwell in

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> have not יָשַׁ֙בְתִּי֙ <S%H3427><s%> Whereas I have not dwelt בְּבַ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> in [any] house לְ֠מִיּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> since the time הַעֲלֹתִ֞י <S%H5927><s%> that I brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וְעַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> even to this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וָאֶֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> have been מִתְהַלֵּ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> but have walked בְּאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> in a tent וּבְמִשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> and in a tabernacle

בְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הִתְהַלַּכְתִּי֮ <S%H1980><s%> In all [the places] wherein I have walked בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> with all the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֲדָבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> I a word דִּבַּ֗רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> spake אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אַחַד֙ <S%H259><s%> with any שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּ֗יתִי <S%H6680><s%> whom I commanded לִרְע֛וֹת <S%H7462><s%> to feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> my people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying לָ֛מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not בְנִיתֶ֥ם <S%H1129><s%> Why build לִ֖י בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> ye not me an house אֲרָזִֽים׃ <S%H730><s%> cedar

וְ֠עַתָּה <S%H6258><s%> Now כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus תֹאמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Now therefore so shalt thou say לְעַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> unto my servant לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> David כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I לְקַחְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H3947><s%> I took מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַנָּוֶ֔ה <S%H5116><s%> thee from the sheepcote מֵאַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> from following הַצֹּ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> the sheep לִֽהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become נָגִ֔יד <S%H5057><s%> to be ruler עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> over my people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel

וָאֶהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> have been עִמְּךָ֗ <S%H5973><s%> with בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who הָלַ֔כְתָּ <S%H1980><s%> And I was with thee whithersoever thou wentest וָאַכְרִ֥תָה <S%H3772><s%> and have cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹיְבֶ֖יךָ <S%H341><s%> all thine enemies מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> out of thy sight וְעָשִׂ֤תִֽי <S%H6213><s%> and have made לְךָ֙ שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> thee a great כְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> like unto the name הַגְּדֹלִ֖ים <S%H1419><s%> of the great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> [men] that [are] in the earth

וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <S%H7760><s%> Moreover I will appoint מָ֠קוֹם <S%H4725><s%> a place לְעַמִּ֨י <S%H5971><s%> for my people לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וּנְטַעְתִּיו֙ <S%H5193><s%> and will plant וְשָׁכַ֣ן <S%H7931><s%> them that they may dwell תַּחְתָּ֔יו <S%H8478><s%> place וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִרְגַּ֖ז <S%H7264><s%> in a place of their own and move ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יֹסִ֤יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> them any more בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> no more neither shall the children עַוְלָה֙ <S%H5766><s%> of wickedness לְעַנּוֹת֔וֹ <S%H6031><s%> afflict כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> as בָּרִאשׁוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H7223><s%> as beforetime

וּלְמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And as since the time אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> i צִוִּ֤יתִי <S%H6680><s%> that I commanded שֹֽׁפְטִים֙ <S%H8199><s%> judges עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> to be over עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> [to be] over my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַהֲנִיחֹ֥תִי <S%H5117><s%> and have caused thee to rest לְךָ֖ מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <S%H341><s%> from all thine enemies וְהִגִּ֤יד <S%H5046><s%> telleth לְךָ֙ יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Also the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בַ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> thee an house יַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> thee that he will make לְּךָ֥ יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> When יִמְלְא֣וּ <S%H4390><s%> be fulfilled יָמֶ֗יךָ <S%H3117><s%> And when thy days וְשָֽׁכַבְתָּ֙ <S%H7901><s%> and thou shalt sleep אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> with thy fathers וַהֲקִימֹתִ֤י <S%H6965><s%> I will set up אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> זַרְעֲךָ֙ <S%H2233><s%> thy seed אַחֲרֶ֔יךָ <S%H310><s%> after אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יֵצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> thee which shall proceed מִמֵּעֶ֑יךָ <S%H4578><s%> out of thy bowels וַהֲכִינֹתִ֖י <S%H3559><s%> and I will establish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַמְלַכְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4467><s%> his kingdom

ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יִבְנֶה־ <S%H1129><s%> He shall build בַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לִשְׁמִ֑י <S%H8034><s%> for my name וְכֹנַנְתִּ֛י <S%H3559><s%> and I will stablish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כִּסֵּ֥א <S%H3678><s%> the throne מַמְלַכְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4467><s%> of his kingdom עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I אֶהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לּ֣וֹ לְאָ֔ב <S%H1><s%> I will be his father וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִּ֣י לְבֵ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> and he shall be my son אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> when בְּהַ֣עֲוֹת֔וֹ <S%H5753><s%> If he commit iniquity וְהֹֽכַחְתִּיו֙ <S%H3198><s%> I will chasten בְּשֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> him with the rod אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> of men וּבְנִגְעֵ֖י <S%H5061><s%> and with the stripes בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

וְחַסְדִּ֖י <S%H2617><s%> But my mercy לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָס֣וּר <S%H5493><s%> shall not depart away מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֲסִרֹ֙תִי֙ <S%H5493><s%> from him as I took מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> from שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> [it] from Saul אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֲסִרֹ֖תִי <S%H5493><s%> whom I put away מִלְּפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וְנֶאְמַ֨ן <S%H539><s%> shall be established בֵּיתְךָ֧ <S%H1004><s%> And thine house וּמַֽמְלַכְתְּךָ֛ <S%H4467><s%> and thy kingdom עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> ever לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before כִּֽסְאֲךָ֔ <S%H3678><s%> thee thy throne יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become נָכ֖וֹן <S%H3559><s%> shall be established עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

כְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> According to all these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וּכְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all הַחִזָּי֣וֹן <S%H2384><s%> and according to all this vision הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> so דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> speak נָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> so did Nathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> unto David ס

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> Then went הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> in and sat לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who אָנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> O אֲדֹנָ֤י <S%H136><s%> Who [am] I O Lord יְהוִה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> and what בֵיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> is my house כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that הֲבִיאֹתַ֖נִי <S%H935><s%> that thou hast brought עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הֲלֹֽם׃ <S%H1988><s%> this

וַתִּקְטַן֩ <S%H6994><s%> And this was yet a small thing ע֨וֹד <S%H5750><s%> and yet זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> in בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> O Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD וַתְּדַבֵּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> but thou hast spoken גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> also אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> of בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> house עַבְדְּךָ֖ <S%H5650><s%> also of thy servant's לְמֵֽרָח֑וֹק <S%H7350><s%> for a great while to come וְזֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תּוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8452><s%> And [is] this the manner הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> O Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> GOD
